Name: Sawtooth "Bloodstone" Combat Knife
Description:
Manufacturer: Kastak Arms
Item Type: Knife
Class: Melee

Size: 16 cm

Don't end up on the wrong side of the Sawtooth combat knife. The blade embodies Kastak Arms' aggressive styling and was designed to stab, slice, or saw. It features a strong tip for piercing, a straight edge for slicing, and a unique serrated edge with microblades for when you really need to rip through something. The blade is also made with a special ceramic polymer coating that enhances its strength and overall wear resistance. For the special Bloodstone edition, a red color was added to the coating to make it even more visually distinct.
